nodes.text: Joti Laike was a male Twi'lek hitman who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, he moved to the planet Lok to try his luck at Nym's Stronghold after a death mark was placed on his head. Nevertheless, around 1 ABY, the Trandoshan bounty hunters Bossk and Balfur Jhcor localized Joti Laike on Lok. Bossk later proposed to a spacer encountered on Corellia to split the bounty. The adventurer therefore traveled to Lok and tracked the assassin to Nym's Stronghold. The spacer attacked Joti Laike and finally killed him.

Joti Laike was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Joti Laike was added to the game with the "Game Update 10", released on June 2, 2009.
